name: Rai-Net Access Battlers
description:
「Rai-Net Access Battlers」 is a board game shown in Steins;Gate, and this is a fan project implementing it. 

I don't claim any rights on the game (except programming), 5pb. Games has all the rights of "Rai-Net Access Battlers".

You can play with your friends over Local Area Network (LAN), Hamachi is recommended for that. Currently, there is only multiplayer mode.
